name: Kangra
details:
Octave Fuzz / Filter Effects Guitar Pedal with Modern/Vintage Fuzz Modes and Lowpass Filter with EnvelopeWalrus Audio's Kangra Filter Fuzz is a true-bypass guitar pedal that serves up fat, sizzling octave fuzz along with '60s-style filter envelope effects. Saturday Night Live guitarist Jared Scharff is a certified fuzz fanatic, and he asked Walrus Audio to design a modern filtered fuzz pedal inspired by his go-to vintage fuzz, the Kay Fuzz Tone. The ensuing collaboration produced the Kangra, which delivered the grit and vintage vibe Scharff was looking for, in a roadworthy pedal with modern features and eye-popping Adam Forster artwork inspired by Jared's trip to the Kangra Valley near the Himalaya Mountains.
https://www.sweetwater.com/store/detail/KangraFuzz--walrus-audio-kangra-filter-fuzz-pedal
